title: Moderna's finance head is out as former employer conducts investigation - BioPharma Dive
content:
1. Moderna's finance head is out as former employer conducts investigation  BioPharma Dive
  2. Moderna Ousts Finance Chief Jorge Gomez in First Week on the Job  The Wall Street Journal
  3. Moderna CFO out after two days in the role as former employer Dentsply discloses probe of financial reporting  MarketWatch
  4. Moderna finance chief lasts one day in the job and gets $1 million payout  Sydney Morning Herald
  5. View Full Coverage on Google News
description: Jorge Gomez, who officially took the CFO reinsÂ Monday, lasted one day on the job. His departure comes as Gomez's previous company, Dentsply Sirona, looks into financial allegations against current and former executives.
